title: Hello Programming 2022 at Don Jose Integrated High School
summary: MCL ACM Student Chapter hosted “Hello Programming 2022: An Hour of Code™ with MCL-ACM” at Don Jose Integrated High School.
description:
December 6, 2022 - MCL ACM Student Chapter hosted “Hello Programming 2022: An Hour of Code™ with MCL-ACM” at Don Jose Integrated High School. This Hour of Code™ event was participated by 43 grade 7 students and  8 volunteers from MCL-ACM.

In the event, the students were given an interactive introduction to the basics of coding using Google Blockly and were shown the possibilities in programming. They also did a coding activity in which the students who came up with the most creative solutions won prizes. At the end of the event, Don Jose Integrated High School awarded MCL-ACM with a certificate of recognition.
